short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Maps & Driving Directions app features quick search to get Maps & Driving Directions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Installation of this extension will configure your New Tab Page to Get Maps & Driving Directions and Changing your search engine to Yahoo.com. 

Enter Your Starting & Ending location to get Driving Directions or Toggle the Map switch to search a location.

The Installation of this extension will configure your New Tab Page to Get Maps & Driving Directions. Maps & Driving Directions extension is all you need to start browsing with quick access to driving directions & web search.

Features:
Personalize your startup page.
Includes time, date,Quick links  and other components.
 We recommend you add the frequently used website shortcuts. 


By installing this extension you agree to the data protection regulations (https://m.mapsr.com/getmapdrivingdirection/privacy.html).

By installing this extension you agree to the main principles in order to use our service:
https://m.mapsr.com/getmapdrivingdirection/terms.html

Used authorizations and reasons:

"Replace the page that appears when you open a new tab."
This way we can show you our product - a new tab with free web search.
